website_summaries.verdict: The backdrop kit of choice for budget-conscious photographers wanting a stable stand.
pros: Wide frame can accommodate large backdrops without becoming unstable
Crossbars slide into each other, locking securely to keep everything together under load
cons: The adjustable bar can be difficult to use without the help of other people on the support bases

customer_reviews.title: The stand worked great and was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I used this to create a backdrop for the bride and groom at a bridal shower. The stand worked great and was easy to assemble! I would note that if you will be putting anything heavy on the stand(like paper flowers) you will need an extra support in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little unsteady
customer_reviews.text: Great for a beginner like me. Gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: kelisha davis

customer_reviews.title: Great for my backdrops!
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for my backdrop. I do candy/dessert tables for parties and special events. This stand works well for how I need it. Easy to assemble and take apart. Very easy to transport. I've only used it on light weight backdrops.
customer_reviews.author: C. G.

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for a professional
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a professional photographer and finds this lightweight kit to be all that she needs. She went to JoAnn's Fabrics and picked up a few pieces of fabric as nice backdrops to hang on it. Keeping the backdrop rolled up is necessary to prevent lines forming in the fabric. The poles are just the right firmness to be stable yet remain light.
customer_reviews.author: David Reno

customer_reviews.title: You have to make sure you tighten each piece and be very careful if you are using it with heavier curtains as they can tip over
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought 3 of these. I used them to hang backgrounds for events. I have hung sheer curtains, glitter fabric and black out curtains from them. They have come in handy, but you have to be careful. They are not very high quality. You have to make sure you tighten each piece and be very careful if you are using it with heavier curtains as they can tip over easily if you are not careful. I used two of these to layer a look for a baby shower. It was tricky getting them set up behind one another, but it worked out and everyone loved the finished product. I love having these.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Works Well And Its A Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I'm completely satisfied. It's almost impossible to buy any of these products because there's always 1 or 2 negative reviews that make it difficult to pull the trigger. Glad I did. Everything worked as advertised. Maybe a little WD40 or grease where the poles connect but only a drop at most, you don't want it to bleed onto your canvas. I bought a wrinkle free heavier canvas and it holds it well. If you're expecting to be able to do gymnastics on this, you can't but for simple, even professional photography, it's great. With the clamps, it held up the black sheet I used for the attached photos, along with the white canvas I bought as well.
customer_reviews.author: Justin P. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: This is super cheap. Like I buy cheap things often but ...
customer_reviews.text: This is super cheap. Like I buy cheap things often but this is beyond cheap. If you’re planning on using this just once that’s fine but if you want to use this several times, good luck. It’s already showing signs that’s it’s falling apart after one use. After I wrote the review the seller emailed me and said they would sent me another one. It’s been weeks and we still have not received it. Wish I didn’t throw the box out bc I would be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Wass

customer_reviews.title: awesome product!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's great, I'm using it for my back drop for my wedding, it's so practical and I can't wait to add the lights! My wedding planner wanted to charge me $225 for my back drop and I got everything I needed for less than $90!!!! Unbeatable! Great for anything!
customer_reviews.author: Anto

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy. Sags really bad in the middle. Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy. Especially in the middle where u need it to be sturdy the most. My back drop sagged badly the whole time in the middle. The farther u stretch it out, the more one or two of the legs won’t touch the ground. But my biggest complaint Is that it sags and is cheaply made. Save your money and buy yourself a really sturdy good one. This one is trash. Everyone talked about how my back drop was sagging in the middle. I was embarrassed.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it's a defective product or defective design ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it's a defective product or defective design, but I would suggest buying this stand from a different vendor, as this photo stand was fairly unstable compared to previous photo stands I've owned. I tried using it for an event this weekend and it fell over three times-never had this problem before with other stands. It's a pain to return, as well, since if you've thrown away the original box it's really hard to find another one in the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would probably be fine for a 5X7 but not bigger
customer_reviews.text: This will not work for a 10x10 back drop. It is also not quite 10' wide, 1-1/2" shy, also only around 7' in height. Would probably be fine for a 5X7 but not bigger. 10' is too flimsy even with sand bags. After set up at house I was afraid to use stands per they would fall over to easy, also did not like 1" sag in the middle at the 10' span on the top pole.The small plastic nut that holds the top pole on was stripped, would be better if metal wing nuts were supplied verse plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Price

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but good things to say about this kit
customer_reviews.text: Nothing but good things to say about this kit. Reasonably priced; easy to tote; adjustable; did the job well for which it was intented.The width goes to 10ft, but the height is only 7ft. They should have others that give you more height, but this size works for us, because we are mostly doing portraits and have not yet encountered a person more than 7ft tall.
customer_reviews.author: deeniecey

customer_reviews.title: Great Portability, Easy Assembly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this not for a photo background, but rather for a theatrical background. A small theatrical group I'm a part of needed to replace large, awkward background panels with something more portable. This background frame has proven to be a great replacement. We can drape fabric backgrounds on this frame and it provides the privacy we need to make costume changes and just be out of view of the audience. It's easy to assemble, one person can do it, but it's better with two people doing it. It is sturdy enough for even heavy fabric.
customer_reviews.author: RJB1207

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Just don’t leave it at your ex’s house and expect to be able to replace everything you don’t get back. In other words, if you lose a weight bag, the carry bag, the fishmouth clamps, the bulbs and the wingnuts (thanks honey) you’re better off rebuying the kit. So don’t lose anything. As for results, I haven’t used it enough to decide whether I should have gone with the soft box kit which is what I’m more used to.
customer_reviews.author: Asher

customer_reviews.title: Served it's purpose for the price
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the DIY photo booth at my mom's surprise 60th birthday party to hold the backdrop. (Forgive the wrinkled pink curtain in the photos, was testing out a heavier material). Takes a about 2 minutes to assemble and has a nice carrying case to make transportation easy. I wouldn't suggest hanging super heavy backdrops on this stand as it could be sturdier, but this worked well for the purpose and the price. I did try out the sand bags to weigh it down more when testing it outside and they seemed to work okay, just wouldn't put this behind a cake table as it may tip in the wind. Will be using this for future events.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy & Weak
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the instructions packet was god awful. Five steps that didn’t correspond to their pictures and were super vague. Had to come back to the product listing to use those photo instructions instead. The whole thing is flimsy and cheap. But the top bar is not strong at all. It sags in the middle at full length, and of course it’s worse when you add the weight of a backdrop. 10 thumbs down.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley B

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy.  Low cost, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: This is a rather flimsy banner stand. I have a 10' wide cloth banner made from a medium weight material and it sags in the middle because of the light cross bar. The side bars are so light that just a light touch will knock them over. If you have light cloth to hang, and you are not going a full 10' across, it will probably work fine. I have to use it this weekend, but I will be looking for another solution for future use.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew R. Yon

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, it’s construction is really cheap. The metal fuses together once assembled, making for disassembly a nightmare. I can probably break it in half with enough force. It’s such a waste of money. I wish I opened the box right away when I bought this thing. I regret waiting a few months after receiving to use it. It’s absolutely a piece of crap. STAY AWAY!!
customer_reviews.author: Petey Ulatan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, but with some problems
customer_reviews.text: This backdrop stand is probably worth the price, but it has a few major issues. First, the cross bar on top does not lock into place when you expand it, which means that any lateral forces will cause it to collapse in on itself. At its fully extended height, it is extremely unstable, even with the provided sandbags. We bought this to use as a DIY photo booth backdrop for our wedding. For those who might have a similar plan, keep in mind that this is pretty short for a photo booth and doesn't extend to the listed height (I measured).
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Well above the quality that I would expect at this price
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting this to be pretty flimsy and short-lived, at this price. I'm not sure I'm going to need a backdrop support for very long, so I didn't want to spend a lot of money on one. This is quite sturdy and nicely made - even the sandbags have double zippers and the cordura pieces are all pretty well sewn. Much better quality than I expected and with its adjustability, I may never have to buy a "better" setup for product photography.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon CustomerTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Good material, very durable stand
customer_reviews.text: This stand is very easy to assemble and it is quite light weight compare to another stand I had but recently broke. This stand also arrive with a storage bag, which is made from more durable material compare to the one I had. I also like how it come with clips and weight bag to stabilize the stand more. My other stand that had broke on me doesn’t have the weight bad so I had to literally strap it down so it wouldn’t fall. I couldn’t wait to use this on my future party events and Photoshoot!
customer_reviews.author: Juli T

customer_reviews.title: Broken pieces in box
customer_reviews.text: Clips to hold poster were broken on delivery ! This ruins a show for me I'm very upset !
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah Seaborn

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: It did its job but had to secured it to a tree with a string in order to avoid a second fall. The wind took it down and had to inflate half of the balloons on the garland. Thank God it did not happen during my baby’s photo shoot. The connecting piece that goes in the center is not secure so I had to use one of the clamps to fasten it so it won’t move beyond where I needed to be. You cannot put or hang anything heavy if you want this backdrop stand bending inward and your decor to look crooked and not sleek. Debating if I want to return it...
customer_reviews.author: Jesus is my Lord and Salvador

customer_reviews.title: But I wasn’t planning on using heavy curtains so this was perfect for my project
customer_reviews.text: A bit flimsy so you can’t put anything heavy on it because the middle will slant down. But I wasn’t planning on using heavy curtains so this was perfect for my project. I bought this for the backdrop for our dessert table and it came out great. It’s been set up in the garage for 2 weeks now and it’s held up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Fallon G.

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a photo booth setup. At the full extension, it is not stable enough to use outdoors, especially if there is any wind. If there are more than a couple people or anyone is taller, they will be outside of the backdrop. I would recommend this for a lightweight fabric and not a roll of backdrop paper. Pros -Inexpensive, good first stand -Came with bag -Easy to setup Cons -Can be unstable -Adjustable metal rod gets stuck at times My expectations weren't high and I felt that this product was decent. I have used nicer backdrop stands, but they were more costly.
customer_reviews.author: AdaChrisTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after my friend had recommended. It is light weight, served its purpose & will be used again...I just felt compared to hers this one (I purchased 3) was a little flimsier. There are little black tops that shld screw in & secure. I found them difficult to ‘catch’ on screw & hold. Also one of them seemed like it had been returned & resold- it was a little scratched & harder to pull the poles a part/attach compared to the other 2. I never called & complained- had contemplated returning one, but I’ll just keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Terry

customer_reviews.title: Sags in the middle, get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: I received mine broken and completely unusable. One of the poles is stuck, but then again, for the price, it's what you get. The pole also sags in the middle. That said, if you are strapped for money and need something affordable or just something quick that would do the trick "for now," this could be an option for you. I don't see it lasting a long time though. In fact, it would probably be dangerous if you have small children (they could knock it over easily). I would invest in something more durable. It's lightweight (but not as a compliment).
customer_reviews.author: Jenny W. Chan

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: I liked the flexibility of the size range. The metal is sturdy enough although when extended it bends in the middle. Also don't like how the legs go out so wide, it is easily tipped over.I can't see it being used for long, I got frustrated with it. Best thing about it is the case everything fits in...not much good of that.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Got this stand to set up the backdrop for my kid birthday, super easy to set it up and works great during the party. It made my decorations look more professionally done and also helped straightened up my backdrop. The only thing I'd recommend is to use your own screw nut to tightened the 2 vertical poles, since the included screw doesn't really do a good job holding them together.
customer_reviews.author: WinWin

customer_reviews.title: Served it’s purpose
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter’s HS graduation & 18th birthday party for the selfie photo booth; light weight, we had no issues, as long as no one runs into it —it held up very well. However, if you are going to elaborately decorate it, then I would strongly consider a sturdier frame with three bars. I’ve since loaned it out 3xs to friends. My next purchase will be the triple bar frame, in case we want to hang balloons & twinkle lights, in addition to the fabric panels; overall, I’m pleased with his product.
customer_reviews.author: Oweary1

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!! Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Set up was a breeze. Bought this for at home photo sessions with my two little ones. Why pay studio fees etc for over $200 when I can play dress up with as many outfits for as long as I need with this perfect photography setup!!
customer_reviews.author: Beauty J.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice beginner's kit. It's not pro quality or super sturdy but it will work fine in a home studio or other light duty usage. I have also used the tripods with flash guns and lightweight booms and they will get you by in a pinch. You will have to buy sandbags if you need them. This kit only comes with pouches to hold the bags, probably 5 lbs max. The included clamps are small but work ok with light fabrics. for the money it's hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Negative459Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: First let me say, these are light weight. The top pole will bow if you use heavy backdrops. But, for light use, they work beautifully and you can't beat the price. They pack up into a convenient carrying case and are very easy to set up. They come with sand bags for the legs, which you'll need if you're using them outside, because they are light weight. We use them to hang backdrops for a photo booth, so tend to buy fun shower curtains or tablecloths to use, and it has no problem handling their weight.
customer_reviews.author: Been There Done That

customer_reviews.title: Good stand.
customer_reviews.text: This stand is good. Easy to set up. It is a bit shaky but full sandbags will fix that. Easy to adjust height and width. Nice compromise among portability, huskiness and price. Instructions for clamps and illustrations were not clear so I did not know how to use them. Vendor sent replacement. It turns out that they need to be opened wide so throat goes around a pipe, not jaws. They worked fine then but was told to keep the new ones. Very good customer service. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: W. Gretsch

customer_reviews.title: Great as stationary.
customer_reviews.text: When the base of the stands are open, this stands about 5’11” tall. If you want it to stand at 7’ tall, you’d have to reduce the circumference of the bases (tripod bases), but it’s really light and will tip over without sandbags. If you have sand bags, you should be okay. It works for me, but this is something that has to be indoor and stationary. If you’re advance and need a portable, you have to be willing to work with it. Or just get a more sturdy one. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.choco

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Zoom background
customer_reviews.text: I got this easy-up frame to drape a green sheet during my Zoom meetings. Setup and tear down is simple! I also like it collapses small and fits into the carrying case with separate compartments for secure storage or transport. Its designers did an excellent job making this! I haven't yet but plan to use it to support a shade style movie screen by drawing the shade up from the floor and hooking to the bar in the middle with a bungee cord.
customer_reviews.author: Bellamy

customer_reviews.title: A very lightweight yet sturdy backdrop holder!
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that I probably purchased one that is a bit too long for what I need! I only need it to make youtube videos, and the "room" I record in is quite small. So I still give this product 5 stars all around as that was my fault when measuring. Otherwise it is lightweight, super easy to set up, and easy to clamp backdrops to. Even if you're just using it inside, I'd still recommend using the sandbags provided because it is so lightweight. I've almost knocked it over several times just because of how I have to situate it in my room to take videos.
customer_reviews.author: C_S

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting to add a backdrop to my studio, but I had no way of putting any up. So choose to purchase this backdrop stand and kit because it was within my price range and had good reviews. This product works as expected. Holds my backdrops in place and is very sturdy. I'm able to adjust the length and height for any size of backdrop I have. Very easy to assemble. And comes with a nice carrying case for easy transport. This was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Melissamarie_gg

customer_reviews.title: Easily Dealt for a Professional Result
customer_reviews.text: My Son ordered this for a requested photoshoot and while he was working I took out the parts and put it together to without a lot of effort to viewing great results. :) Once it was assembled I moved it over to the room where the photoshoot would take place, and THAT was superbly easy to manage as it comes apart in sections without a lot of effort as well! The professional setup when I finished placing everything where it needed to go was to have an overall thumbs up from the friend requesting this event. Excellent price and not a lot of work to accomplish what was needed at the time! :)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: So I pitched the idea of getting a projector to my wife about 2 years ago and finally pulled the trigger this year. I went with this product because of the price and the overall reviews. The product is sturdy, super easy to assemble, and sturdy. The case is not made of the most durable materials in that my younger brother accidentally place one of the legs inside the case incorrectly resulting in the seam bursting open. Outside of that this product was definitely worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Might work but ONLY with light weight backdrops
customer_reviews.text: Anything heavier than a light backdrop will make the crossbar bow under the pressure when extended fully. The stands are too short (at 10 ft crossbar extension, you'd need to jack your backdrop higher in order to make sense photo composition-wise). They are also very flimsy at full extension. This set would be good for a one-person headshot but for anything larger, this did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian R.

customer_reviews.title: Best stand ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I've went through a few different brand stands and this is by far, my absolute favorite. It's super easy to use and locks where you need it to. I've had other stands that would sometimes drop on their own. I use this to do photo shoots with my kids/birthday parties and appreciate the sturdiness. and I also appreciate the clips and sand bags that it comes with. I plan on buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: If I don’t have help I won’t be able to break it down myself so for that I don’t like this product
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving 2 stars instead of 1 and thats because it came with clips. The problem i have with it is at the top where it connects is so hard to break down I literally have to have 2 people helping me the 2 times I’ve used it. If I don’t have help I won’t be able to break it down myself so for that I don’t like this product
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Backdrop Stand
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and was kinda nervous about it since I didn't know if I would get good use out of. Well, I can tell you that I was absolutely pleased with my purchase and highly recommend this product. It was very sturday and you can adjust to any size. Very very happy with it and I know I will use it again and again.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: YES GET IT
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo my family has been into making DIY photobooths for all of life's occassions. Before ordering this incredible product, we were always scrambling around to find the best place to build our photobooth (normally plastic table clothes duct taped to the wall... somewhere). With this handy product, we've been able to create some AWESOME photobooths - it mainly helps that it's increased where we can place it (if you make photobooths at home, I'm sure you have an idea what I'm talking about). I would 10/10 recommend this product. Of course, I don't really want to tell my friends because I want my family to keep being the *cool* party fam with the insane photobooths hehe
customer_reviews.author: Macy

customer_reviews.title: Nice for parties
customer_reviews.text: You need 2 people to put together but it is easy to do. It doesn't come with actual instructions on how to use but it's easy to figure out. It's not a bad product for personal use and family parties. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Lidia G.

customer_reviews.title: Could be more sturdy...
customer_reviews.text: Not a photographer, but do help a lot with school and other social events. Therefore, I was tired of always asking for a backdrop kit, so decided to purchase one. I like the height and width, but definitely NOT STURDY at all at its max size. When used at a smaller size it was better. As long as no one touched the backdrop, it seemed to stay up. It was fairly easy to assemble, although a bit harder to do so alone - but I got it done. Will continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: yasemined

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR BASIC USES
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use for photographing items to resell. It works well for my purpose. It is very easy to assemble and super light weight. It is sturdy enough for what I need, but I don’t think it’s very sturdy. It moves easily and I would not use a heavy backdrop on it. I do wish I would have bought a bigger one for my needs though, but this works just fine for now and for the prices.
customer_reviews.author: Losin' It

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend as it is not stable or steady.
customer_reviews.text: It was very disappointing to spend so much money on all the things that go on the stand only for the stand not to work well. When I first opened it and tried to set it up - at first it looked good for the price. When I put the curtains on it - it bent in the middle. It was embarrassing to have everything else look good and the backdrop look cheap and sloppy. It does not hold any weight and any thing you put on it made it bend.
customer_reviews.author: NFlorida

customer_reviews.title: It is very adjustable to different sizes and heights
customer_reviews.text: It arrived way ahead of the projected date. It was super easy to assemble. It is not really sturdy but has two (sand) bags that can be filled up to approx. 8 lbs each, which would definitely be beneficial if needed outside in a windy situation. I am still waiting on my back drop so I haven't been able to use it yet. Looks like it is going to do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: cmreese232

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: This was not sturdy at all. I had it setup under a canopy and had to tie the top and sides to the pole of the canopy. The two black screws that’s suppose to keep it together wasn’t tight at all. They got lost right away somehow. It’s definitely not for outdoor use unless it’s a day that has no kind of wind if you plan to use it alone. If used indoors, I’d say there shouldn’t be a problem but considering the top screws fell off who knows.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle.

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. I used bags of rice instead of sand in "sand" bags. Good quality if you wont be using a lot (assembling often).
customer_reviews.author: R. Howell

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome deal! They must’ve read the reviews and made Improvements! Bought for 120 inch projector screen. Package came in time and neatly wrapped. Not a scratch or nick, has all parts. The instructions aren’t great lol but it’s so easy you don’t really need them. All the carrying case and sand bags are good quality and have no rips, tears and seem sturdy when I put a 5lb weight in them and tossed it around a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Nati

customer_reviews.title: Great price, okay set up
customer_reviews.text: Great price, okay set up. The poles are a little flimsier than I'd like, but it gets the job done. The screws to keep the horizontal bar along the top do not stay in securely so it made it a little difficult to keep a heavy duty photo backdrop on.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: For the price you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The 2 stands its comes with are shorter then I expected and very weak. I had to switch them out with my light stands. I did like the clips it came with as they provide a strong firm hold for the backdrop fabric. The bag came in handy to hold the connecting poles. As for the sand bags I haven't used them yet but the fabric they are built with feels strong as I tend to use 2 or 3lb weights in them instead of actual sand. I'd say it is an easy affordable set up nothing too fancy for professional studios. Small enough for home studios.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Great product that fit my need
customer_reviews.text: Such an easy set up! Exactly what I needed for my photo booth set up. It held over a 100 balloons and the background material. Very sturdy. Perfect height and width. Can't go wrong with this purchase at this price!
customer_reviews.author: Vero

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble...Kinda Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Definitely use the included sandbags for heavier draping or back drops for the support. The bags can be bulky so make sure you have enough material to cover them up. The set itself is super easy to assemble though the middle portion can come loose if isn't fully extended. I clamped it and it stayed where I needed it to be. For the price though, it did the job.
customer_reviews.author: M.G.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for - cheap plastic attachment hardware.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and flimsy (you get what you pay for). The worst part is that the pieces that screw on to keep the top bar attached to the sides are plastic. After one or two uses they are stripped and essentially useless. I'm concerned that it may be a safety issue (you don't want a metal bar falling on anyone)!
customer_reviews.author: EmKRose

customer_reviews.title: Most sturdy and durable backdrop stand.
customer_reviews.text: This is not complicated at all, very sturdy and I'm impressed I was going to purchase a more pricey model I did not go wrong. Must buy I strongly recommend. It didn't bring the sand for but personally it didn't need it. I will be getting some though since I will be attaching some curtains and a balloon arch for my daughters sweet 16. Hopefully I can post more pics. Overall its amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Yania

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy  to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hold a backdrop for a retirement party. Compact, lightweight, very easy to assemble: comes with sand bags and clips. The person who helped me set up was impressed enough to ask me where I bought it. A photographer friend asked to borrow it for a small party. I'm not sure about long-term sturdiness but it worked great for my event.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Practical, and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it was to assemble! I was concerned that because I was using a fabric backdrop that it would be too heavy and i would need to weigh it down but no it was perfect. It is very lightweight so you can move it around. I didn’t need to use the sandbag so I was happy about that because I wasn’t looking forward to filling it and having to clean it up. But the bag for sand does have a double zipper so it gave me piece of mind it wouldn’t get all over the place. Over all I would def buy again
customer_reviews.author: I. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Get it! Easy to put together and store
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up and take down. Great for backdrops, easy height adjustment. I recommend this over DIY with pvc piping. Bags do not come with sand however we ended up not needing them.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad buy for a last minute resort, but as a balloon artist and event planner this is very cheaply made. I was scared the center of the pole was going to bend inward, not sturdy at all. Had to use sand bags and water balloons to add some wright as I decorated it with a vinyl backdrop and organic arch. Good buy for something quick but not long term.
customer_reviews.author: Chocolates De Laura

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for my indoor party.. i didn't use the sand bags but was sturdy for my light vinyl banner i used at my party. it took like 5 minutes to setup the clips are definitely a bonus and they are very tight so if you have a tough times with your hands you will need help.. but that would likely be for any of these clips. I'm super glad for my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Starla94

customer_reviews.title: Too flimsy and unwieldy to set up. Plastic nuts strip too easily
customer_reviews.text: Used as background for Smule karaoke app. The two plastic nuts that secure the crossbar at top broke due the wear and tear they get setting the stand up. It's just too flimsy and difficult to work with setting up and the nuts get the brunt of the abuse. The sliding bars are also annoying. They are constantly sliding in when making simple adjustments, thus making the backdrop fold inwards and collapse.
customer_reviews.author: richard paguirigan

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy. So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: I am not a professional photographer, but i have work with a few porfessional photographers for many years shooting my projects. This time tho, I plan to start shooting my own products that i sell on line. As a beginner I believe this is a good deal. It works perfectly with a fabric backdrop. I am son switiching to using savage paper as my background for a smoother flawless finish, so ai am not sure if it can carry and hold the weight of the paper. I might have to update it later on.
customer_reviews.author: raymondshead

customer_reviews.title: Beware: Returned twice for missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item from the warehouse. The first time I got it, it was missing the center pole. I ordered a replacement, and the replacement had the wrong center poles. I'm quite frustrated that I now have to return both items and start all over again. I highly suggest buying this item new instead of used, so you can save the headache. It's not worth the few dollars in savings.
customer_reviews.author: Dino Rowan Traite

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Use for my eBay listings.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my husband and I love it. It’s so easy to assemble and does exactly what I needed to do. I use this for eBay primarily and it has made my pictures look great. You will need to play around with the light boxes to figure out where it needs to be for each item, but other than that this was a must needed investment.
customer_reviews.author: The Walls Household

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I need
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to hang my backdrop on, and this fits the bill perfectly. Coverage is enough for a 6-foot tall person from head to toe in a horizontal shot, and easy to put together, take apart and transport, and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni G

customer_reviews.title: Not meant for large or heavy backdrops!
customer_reviews.text: It is very light weight and easy to set up and brake down. I bought this as a replacement for my old set up and I was disappointed with the quality. My old set up was made a lot better but you get what you pay for. It is good for a simple light backdrop but I would not put a paper roll backdrop on it, it feels very flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Laquita Parks-Lewis

customer_reviews.title: worth to buy!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I bought two of them to use it as room divider! And a 10 feet * 7 feet is hung out over it! It's fairly durable but when wind blows you have to fill the sandbag to make it stand still. It's really easy to assemble it and the manual is so simple to follow, you have no problem with it. There is another point, there are some clliper-like to adjust the height (you can see in the pictures) and the are plastic, I think it would be more durable if they made from metal.
customer_reviews.author: Masoud

customer_reviews.title: Very good screen stand
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good screen stand. It expands to any size. It comes with weight bags to remain sturdy. It is lightweight and it can support 120 inch screen. This is a very good price point for a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: This thing comes with the whole 9 yards! The biggest issue I have is the minimum width of the cross bar connectors, wish I could squeeze them in just a tiny bit more. They also connect to the main stands kind of awkwardly and a little loosely like a Swiffer mop but looser. Overall totally worth the mobility of my green screen.
customer_reviews.author: BOF

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great stand. Not flimsy and held up many backdrops including decor attached for my parties. We had to put this in our carry on luggage to fly to another state to throw a party and it's super lightweight and didn't add too much to the weight total. Super easy assembly. It takes two people to raise the stand up though.
customer_reviews.author: DL703

customer_reviews.title: So lightweight, it falls down!
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This stand fell down - without being pushed - and broke an expensive lamp. OK. The lamp is my fault, but I thought the stand would be sturdier. The green screen was not particularly heavy! Not a good product. If you need to support a green screen, but something that is easier to put together (yeah, that's another point) and one that is solid.
customer_reviews.author: SZ.

customer_reviews.title: Ok for price
customer_reviews.text: It’s good for the price. The issues I have are that when I try to lift the stands to move it the rubber screw jumps out. It doesn’t feel like it gets tighten. I’ve used other stands where it comes with a bolt instead of rubber which makes it more secure, just a suggestion for the makers(I attached a photo). My other big issue is the poles don’t feel secured even with you latch it in.
customer_reviews.author: Raiza

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and take down. Comes with four clips which I thought I might have to buy more but glad I didn’t have too. The grips are really sturdy and holds the backgrounds nicely. Comes with two bags which can be filled up with sand for extra sturdiness but haven’t had to use them. The stand is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Uribe

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap quality -- customer service very poor
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy, cheap, piece of junk. The cross-bar bends, the structure tips over. Waste of money. Took a long time to ship. I contacted Emart to find out when it would ship, and they gave me a nonsense answer that was incomprehensible. Could have just said "ask Amazon, " but gave me some longwinded and stupid response. Bunch of jerks.
customer_reviews.author: N.E.T.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it very sturdy, my last one started breaking and dont know why I only use it to take pictures of my kids but this one was easy and you can break it down fast. Very happy it even comes with sand bags.
customer_reviews.author: Tiana Slade

customer_reviews.title: Decent stand and worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Decent buy. Served the intended purpose. Nothing much to complain. If you are into photography and need a decent stand, this one is for you. We used it for our halloween party and it definitely did help a good deal. I would still be inclined to give it a 5 star ,as it came well packed and assembly was very very simple. Took me less than 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: SPYK

customer_reviews.title: Umm,it's ok
customer_reviews.text: Not very sturdy. I would use mostly for lightweight backdrops,not fabric drops. Too much work to get it to stand and stay without leaning. Even with the sandbags.
customer_reviews.author: Trista

customer_reviews.title: Light, easy to assemble & carrying case!
customer_reviews.text: I had this assembled within 10 minutes of receiving it! It males a massive screen frame capable of a sheet or lightweight photomatte. The dual sandbags included won't be needed by me personally (I only do indoor shoots) but they both make awesome carry bags for other items! All in all, I give this a *****!.
customer_reviews.author: Feryl Foxwood

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but not in a good way
customer_reviews.text: Had this outside on a nice day we had sand bags at the base but the top was so flimsy that it kept bowing inwards. frustrating. we had to use tape, rope, and anything else we could find to keep it square. We put in the backdrop and took our photos and it just fell over. We wanted it to stand all day for people to continue taking photos but it was a no go. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: Genette32

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money but measure and bring plyers.
customer_reviews.text: So worth the money but the for the first use you might need plyers. We couldn't get it apart and had to call someone to bring plyers. Allow a lot of space because in order for this to look right you need to really spread it out. But very durable and otherwise easy to put up and take down with a great storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, worth the money,  easy to travel
customer_reviews.text: Straight to the point!! I LOVE ...LOVE...LOVE this set. I have used it multiple times on different occasions. With curtains, backdrops, balloon garlands etc. ... it is easy to set up and take along ... one thing I would reccomend is putting some sand or rocks something with a little weight to out in the black pouches provided to place one on each side of the pole. I did this because once you start adding balloons and curtains it tends to be a little flimsy because of the extra weight.... so to hold its balaoplace the weight bags on each side.
customer_reviews.author: jocelyn polanco

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: So flimsy and I feel like everything is breaking very quickly after four uses. I use it as a photo back drop at parties and it has fallen over at every single party which is embarrassing. It is ours together nicely except for the center poll which is hard to put together and pull apart. Not to mention the piece that holds it together broke after three uses. The sand bag pouches tore easily and are now pretty much worthless. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: dusty

customer_reviews.title: The package came quickly
customer_reviews.text: Emart Photo Video Studio 10Ft Adjustable Background Stand Backdrop Support System Kit with Carry Bag (New) It was packed well and the product was sturdy, except for the button that slips in place to hold the pipes together. It doesn't fit in the hole. Besides that, it was easy to put together and strong enough to forego the button fitting in the slot. The bag to hold all the pieces ripped as soon as I put the pieces in and there's velcro on one side but not on the other. I guess you get what you pay for as most others I looked at were a lot more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Christle

customer_reviews.title: Not bad not the best
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s what you would expect. Cons- The problem I have with these lightweight backdrops is how easily they can tilt over on to someone. The weight bags are super helpful because the side screws aren’t enough to hook them onto and unless the legs are out super wide they can’t rest there. The bag it comes with doesn’t fit all 4 pieces into the inner slot where they won’t slide out Pros It’s nice and tall if needed. The clips are great to have but could be nicer plastic. It’s lightweight as described, gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: C & B

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but top bar is loose.
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to assemble! I love the size. Didnt get to use it yet but it looks like the top bar wont hold the backdrop how it is supposed to, top bar is very loose and because of how long it is it tends to bend in the middle (without anything on it, dont know how is going to work once i put the backdrop on it since is going to have a little weight). Would definitely need to add tape on it to make sure it doesnt come apart
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: Takes up a good amount of space but it got the job done
customer_reviews.text: With some practice, I was able to take down the backdrop and put it back up in under a minute. It takes up a decent amount of space but it's fairly easy to take down and put back up. The one problem I always have is setting up the tripods so that it is perfectly even. One side always seems a bit higher than the other side. It doesn't affect the photos but it's a bit annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Torres

customer_reviews.title: A great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfect for my Mrs. claus videos. The fact that it was height adjustable as well as length is what sold me. Easy to put together, lightweight. He only con on this was when extended to the fullest it was a little wobbly however I did not use the sandbags. All in all, a great product.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Doty

customer_reviews.title: Really flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Really flimsy. The backdropbeam is two tubes with extenders, so it’s really weak in the middle and can dip. My friend has a backdrop stand that cost the same but has a stronger cross beam (four tubes, stronger beam and stand overall). The stands are pretty flimsy too. I got this because of the extras, but I think I got my money’s worth here. I’m going to return it and just buy the $150 Calumet 10x12 heavy duty professional backdrop stand I was looking at because the stands double as light stands.
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed on how long it took to deliver the stand. Not only that but when I opened the box, the carrying bag was damaged. The velcro was coming off and there was a hole in it. I'm trying to get my business off the ground and I expect to get better quality products than this for the money I'm paying. This equipment is an investment and I cant have damaged products being delivered right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: K V

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully Easy to Use and sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: It took me months to open the box because I assumed the stand was going to be hard to assemble, and boy was I wrong! It literally took maybe 15 minutes and I only had to connect one pole! This is so easy and quick to assemble! It is very lightweight and offers such ease of use! I'd recommend this stand over and over! My podcast The Muzzle is Off thanks you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikiya Mone

customer_reviews.title: Good kit
customer_reviews.text: It’s so lightweight which is great for studio and travel photography. The sandbags are definitely useful and needed if you have a shoot with little kids. This kit does Not come with sand, but you can always purchase rice and put it in a ziplock baggie before putting it into the sandbag socks (cheaper alternative to sand).
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn

customer_reviews.title: Backdrop Stand
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for personal reasons. We always have parties at my house and I pay people for their backdrops. THis was inexpensive so I decided to have one for myself. I was pleasantly surprised how easy it was to set up. Not too heavy. Came with a bag to carry everything. I would recommend this for someone who has a traveling business that has the need for a backdrop. My daughter now uses it for her business. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Crayton

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than anticipated, better for closeup shots
customer_reviews.text: It’s smaller than I thought it would be. I can only take up close pictures and not full body pics like I had wanted. I’m a drag queen, so my wigs with heels go higher than the top of the stand. A bit underwhelmed and disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Russo

customer_reviews.title: Really fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: I like this product however it’s soo light weight that it kept moving back and forward with the wind. I used it outside. You won’t have any issues if you use it inside. Good product and the shipping was super super fast.
customer_reviews.author: adriana alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed
customer_reviews.text: I had to take a hacksaw to the top bar to it to get it to go together, and it does not fit over the top points and screw down. The holes are not big enough for the points. I had to use it since it came at the last minute, and was for an event, but I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great value, works well for backdrops
customer_reviews.text: This backdrop support has worked very well for me, and I would buy it again as a good value. Assembly is easy, the fittings hold well, and adjustments and takedown are quick. It is rock solid? Of course not, but it is fine for an indoor setting where it will not get bumped, etc.
customer_reviews.author: T.willy

product_meta.title: Emart Photo Video Studio 10Ft Adjustable Background Stand Backdrop Support System Kit with Carry Bag
feature_bullets: Kit included: (2) x Adjustable Crossbar, (2) x Light Stand, (4) x Heavy Duty Spring Clamp, (2) x Sandbag, (1) x Convenient Carry Bag. / 12 Months warranty for manufacturing defects.
Backdrop Stand Kit, professional lightweight pipe and drape support stand for family gathering, wedding, as well as for professional photography or party.
Adjustable Backdrop Stand, easy to assemble and disassemble by one person in just a few minutes, adjust the height ( from 2.6 ft to 7 ft ) and width ( from 5 ft to 10 ft ).
Photo Backdrop Stand with 4 Spring Clamps, holds canvas, muslin, or paper, prevent background slippage.
Sandbag for Photo Backdrop Stand, premium quality nylon, stabilize the backdrop support system. (NOTE: this bag comes empty, please filled with gravel, or any other material to add weight.)​

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars6,631 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
